Text: PL CAPACITY RESTRICTIONpst Notice to all Dominion Transmission shippers Effective for the gas day of Sunday June until further notice there will be no interruptible transportation capacity or nonPL transportation capacity available along the PL system This restriction to Primary PL deliveries to Primary delivery points is so that Dominion Transmission can perform pipeline pigging operations during this time All interruptible and secondary deliveries along the PL system will be reduced to zero effective for the gas day of June at ECT CCT Please contact your Customer Analyst if you have any questio

CUSTOMER UPDATEpst NEW ESCRIPT PRINT FUNCTION You can now do print screens on EScript To take advantage of this new feature in the menu file click on file and print screen MAY IMBALANCE VOLUMES May Imbalance Volumes are now available to view online They may be viewed in ESCRIPT through the Flowing GasImbalance Window If you have any questions please contact me John Lester at or Doug Barr at PL RESTRICTION The work schedule for the pigging of the PL system that was originally scheduled for Monday June has been changed to Wednesday June This notice replaces the previous notice posted on Tuesday June th The implementation of this restriction on Wednesday means that there will be no interruptible transportation capacity or nonPL transportation capacity available along the PL system This restriction will also require that all deliveries at that time on the PL system be made to their primary delivery point All interruptible and secondary deliveries along the PL system will be reduced to zero effective for the gas day of June at ECT CCT Please give me a call if you have any questions LATE SHIFT WEEKEND DUTY JUNE through JUNE To contact the Transportation Analyst working the late shift or weekend call You will have access to Analyst on duty or the EScript helpline WEEKEND SATURDAY JUNE thru SUNDAY JUNE NAME PHONE NO PAGER PIN NO CELL PHONE David Marks Mandy Stout LATE SHIFT PM JUNE thru JUNE Ken Skinner MonTuesWed Beverly Keadle Thursday Mark Llaneza Friday The analyst working LATE SHIFT will be available from pm to pm est Our WEEKEND and HOLIDAY duty office hours are from am pm each day To reach an analyst after hours please call the above pager number and follow the recorded message instructions Please feel free to page an analyst anytime during or after scheduled office hours Should you still have difficulty reaching an Analyst please call our Gas Control at and they will contact someone from CUSTOMER SERVICES THE ON CALL ANALYST FOR CAPACITY RELEASE AND ESCRIPT HELPLINE CAN BE CONTACTED BY CALLING PAGER PIN CELLULAR Thanks Ora Ash External Phone Tie line
